UniprotID	Q9UQB9
Accession	Q9UQB9;O60681;O75442;Q6AZY8;Q6DLZ0;Q9UPK5
EntryName	AURKC_HUMAN
ProteinName	Aurora kinase C (EC 2.7.11.1) (Aurora 3) (Aurora/IPL1-related kinase 3) (ARK-3) (Aurora-related kinase 3) (Aurora/IPL1/Eg2 protein 2) (Serine/threonine-protein kinase 13) (Serine/threonine-protein kinase aurora-C)
GeneName	AURKC AIE2 AIK3 AIRK3 ARK3 STK13
Length	309
Function	Serine/threonine-protein kinase component of the chromosomal passenger complex (CPC), a complex that acts as a key regulator of mitosis. The CPC complex has essential functions at the centromere in ensuring correct chromosome alignment and segregation and is required for chromatin-induced microtubule stabilization and spindle assembly. Also plays a role in meiosis and more particularly in spermatogenesis. Has redundant cellular functions with AURKB and can rescue an AURKB knockdown. Like AURKB, AURKC phosphorylates histone H3 at 'Ser-10' and 'Ser-28'. AURKC phosphorylates the CPC complex subunits BIRC5/survivin and INCENP leading to increased AURKC activity. Phosphorylates TACC1, another protein involved in cell division, at 'Ser-228'.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Chromosome; Chromosome; Centromere; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Spindle
Disorder	0.3667,0.4017,0.3872,0.4292,0.4979,0.4801,0.4979,0.5296,0.5577,0.4685,0.4541,0.4901,0.4541,0.4725,0.4441,0.4507,0.4476,0.5296,0.6322,0.6576,0.7629,0.7595,0.7951,0.7916,0.7415,0.7036,0.7369,0.6269,0.6227,0.5211,0.6482,0.7036,0.5493,0.6043,0.4766,0.4685,0.4582,0.5254,0.4292,0.4220,0.3910,0.3910,0.3872,0.2541,0.2849,0.3321,0.2645,0.1852,0.1881,0.1583,0.2193,0.1399,0.1298,0.2292,0.2193,0.3182,0.2129,0.1399,0.0799,0.1115,0.0690,0.0676,0.0433,0.0269,0.0269,0.0269,0.0244,0.0389,0.0372,0.0662,0.0780,0.0835,0.1323,0.0835,0.0835,0.0870,0.0851,0.0985,0.1554,0.2129,0.2503,0.2364,0.2503,0.2292,0.3149,0.3910,0.4051,0.3215,0.3215,0.4186,0.4409,0.4541,0.3566,0.2783,0.3566,0.2645,0.1759,0.1823,0.1823,0.1048,0.1115,0.1092,0.1501,0.1399,0.2164,0.1501,0.1115,0.0662,0.0646,0.0364,0.0372,0.0191,0.0153,0.0287,0.0463,0.0463,0.0835,0.0835,0.0433,0.0719,0.1424,0.0817,0.0817,0.0929,0.0929,0.1007,0.1424,0.1373,0.2064,0.2988,0.3872,0.3704,0.4582,0.4541,0.4292,0.3426,0.2541,0.2575,0.3494,0.3494,0.3215,0.3182,0.3740,0.2783,0.2884,0.2064,0.1298,0.1323,0.2129,0.2034,0.1881,0.1251,0.0765,0.0719,0.0851,0.0851,0.0835,0.1373,0.1476,0.1476,0.2364,0.1881,0.1162,0.0835,0.1399,0.0690,0.1115,0.1702,0.1823,0.1251,0.1251,0.0734,0.0948,0.1611,0.0851,0.0888,0.0372,0.0676,0.0443,0.0364,0.0356,0.0380,0.0646,0.0631,0.1048,0.1007,0.1852,0.1969,0.1611,0.0967,0.1399,0.1476,0.1528,0.1852,0.1092,0.1298,0.1476,0.2918,0.3053,0.3356,0.2470,0.2541,0.2292,0.2258,0.3182,0.2328,0.2503,0.2645,0.2541,0.2292,0.3215,0.2399,0.1323,0.1323,0.0749,0.1275,0.1424,0.0765,0.0380,0.0205,0.0275,0.0287,0.0171,0.0125,0.0130,0.0087,0.0141,0.0153,0.0088,0.0093,0.0119,0.0100,0.0143,0.0258,0.0443,0.0851,0.0870,0.0719,0.1162,0.1823,0.1791,0.1092,0.1702,0.1823,0.2503,0.1852,0.2680,0.1399,0.1373,0.1583,0.1476,0.1206,0.1611,0.1007,0.1070,0.0888,0.0817,0.0835,0.0888,0.0506,0.0506,0.0870,0.0870,0.0506,0.0749,0.0380,0.0618,0.0734,0.0870,0.0817,0.1349,0.0817,0.1206,0.0618,0.0870,0.0909,0.0631,0.0389,0.0356,0.0592,0.1206,0.0555,0.0372,0.0690,0.0
